p.span: Click Here to view New Milford Schools Home Instruction Plan

a.title: Go to comments for New Milford Public Schools Home Instruction Plan

span.strong: Kindergarten Registration for the 2020-21 school year has started. Please call your child's school to schedule your appointment and click below for the online form to register your child for the 2020-2021 school year.

span.em: Please note: Kindergarten registrants must be 5 years of age on or by Oct 1st, 2020.

h2.strong: ClICK HERE to register your child for the 2020-2021 School Year.

span.h2: CLICK HERE to view 2020-21 Kindergarten Registration Flyer.
CLICK HERE to view instructions if your child is currently enrolled in New Milford's preschool this year.

span.strong: CLICK HERE If you are NEW to our district for the 2019-20 school year. (NOTE: this is NOT the link for Kindergarten Registration 2020-2021.)

span.span: If you are a Returning Student for the 2019-20 school year.

span.strong: To begin as a Returning Student, you will need your student's snapcode, which you should have received via email. If you did not receive it, please contact your child's school.
If you have already entered the snapcode and created an account, click on the link Continue Your Work. Sign in and complete your form.
